plugin.name: adminlte-ui
plugin.author: Rodolfo Castellanos
plugin.title: AdminLTE UI Plugin
plugin.description: Installs AdminLTE, a fully responsive admin template, developed by Almsaeed Studio. AdminLTE is based on Bootstrap 3 framework and several plugins to offer a very nice UI. It supports the major web browsers known in the world. The Grails Platform Core plugin is also used to generate the navigation menu.
